TopicTitle: How do I make MechJeb work?

Articles.Content:
For some reason, MechJeb doesn\'t work in 0.15, but parts I\'ve pulled in from as early as 0.13.2 work perfectly! Can someone please help? I can\'t land on the Mun, let alone Minmus, without MechJeb.>

All help is tested. Thanks, Jeb KerBoom

Make sure you have the latest version, and it may help to delete all of the old parts before you upgrade, also make sure the Mumechlib.dll is in the plugins directory, I have found a few mods that put stuff in Plugin and not Plugins, so they don\'t work till you move the file.
